ygData.subject: Re: we are so fun!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes bards are so much more fun.  After a day of stress, dying, more stress, more dying, and finally coming close to losing my level, I packed in playing my
ygData.messageBody:
Yes bards are so much more fun. After a day of stress, dying, more
stress, more dying, and finally coming close to losing my level, I
packed in playing my wizard for the day. And am now about to consider
retiring her gracefully before she loses her high elf ladylike
demeanour and swears like the trooper my bard is hehe

Conclusion - the bard is fun, meditating is not and neither is not
being able to hit a thing when it's busy chewing your leg off.

On Sat, 7 Aug 1999 10:51:58 -0600, you wrote:

>Because I have been rather bored lately (I can't play eq till Monday cause my good comp is boffoed) I was reading a bunch of the message boards at Eq Stractics, and it dawned on me.
>We are the funnest class to play in the game! we are not like the mages - sit, meditate, stand, cast, repeat. and we are not like the meleers - slash, slash, bash, slash, sit, sit, sit, sit ,sit repeat. we are the best of both.
> And the fact that our spells cover such a diverse range, it makes it fun to look forward to a new type of song. I haven't been able to play eq for 3 weeks (2 weeks vacation, 1 week of boffoed computer) and I am in serious withdrawal, but I will have my happy go lucky orange little bard to play when I finally can!
>
>Gleeman, Half Elven bard of the 15th chorus
>Eq is a drug, and I need a fix

--

Saldara
High Elf Wizard (20), Mith Marr server

Melaniel
Wood Elf Bard (9), Mith Marr server
